title: High on hotels: A gold rush starts as businesses find 'room' for growth
description: The hospitality sector in India is attracting a diverse range of investors, including book publishers, car dealers, and school owners, in addition to industrial groups. The increased interest is driven by the country's growing economy and high demand for hospitality services. Hotel companies are also expanding to meet the surge in demand, while standalone properties in non-metro areas are being acquired by hotel chains. Factors such as the rise of travel as a lifestyle trend, improved infrastructure, and changing social norms are contributing to the long-term growth potential of the hospitality sector in India.
